processing_structure.text: Loop from 1 to the input value

advice.text: You have listed the main steps; check they match the task: read an integer, sum its divisors, and print the result.
Think about what must happen inside the loop: how to test if a number is a divisor and when to update the running sum.
Under the loop comment, write sub-comments like 'for each i from 1 to n' and 'if i divides n, add i to the sum'; then translate these sub-comments into code.
